forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy for the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 36F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. High 46F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 43F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 53F. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
